instructions: Place the silver charger at the bottom center of the table cloth.
Place the dinner fork on the left hand side of the charger centered with the plate.
Place the dinner knife directly opposite to the dinner fork on the right hand side of the charger.
The salad fork is placed directly to the left of and centered with the dinner fork.
The salad knife is to be placed directly to the right of the dinner knife lined up with it.
The soup spoon is placed directly to the right of and centered with the salad knife.
The dessert spoon is placed right above the charger pointing towards the left side of the plate.
The dessert fork is then placed with the prongs facing towards the right hand side of the charger.
The bread plate is placed to the left hand side of the table directly above the forks.
The butter knife is place in the center of the bread plate at a 45 degree angle away from charger..
The dinner glass is placed on the right hand side of the table directly across from the bread plate.
The napkin is folded into a fan and placed directly in the center of the dinner plate.
